Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.

The characters are Kaz, Inej, Matthis, Nina, Wylan, Jesper. Ask me about each character to learn more about them!

Kaz Brekker or the Bastard of the Barrel one of the main character in the series. He is know around the Barrel for is reputation was being ruthless and unforgiving. He does; however, have a soft spot the crew. Although at times it may not seem like it, Kaz loves Inej. (Things mentioned: Inej Ghafa, The barrel)

Inej Ghafa or wraith is also one of the main characters. She is known for being able to slip in locations and places without being noticed. She is Kaz's right hand women, and is in love with Kaz.(Things mentioned: Kaz Brekker)

Matthis is the groups bruiser, after being thrown into the Hellgate Prison Matthis came out hardened and with a wish of revenge for the person who put him in there: Nina Zenik. Before he was in Hellgate he was a Drüskelle, a Fjerdain warrior who is tasked with hunting and killing Grisha. Even though Nina was the one to send him to Hellgate he does eventually fall [back] in love her.(Things mentioned: Nina Zenik, Fjerdia, Grisha)

Wylan was brought into the Crew by Kaz as a demolition man. Unknown to the crew at the time Wylan was the son of Jan Van Eck, the man who was going to pay then 30 million kruge; however, as time goes on Wylan proves to be more than a barganning chip for Kaz. He eventually falls for Jesper Fahey. (Things mentioned: Jesper Fahey, Kruge, Jan Van Eck.)

Jesper Fahey is the groups sharpshooter. He is secretly a Grisha Fabrikator. He is always craking jokes and annoying/flirting with Wylan. He his very protective of Wylan and eventually falls in love with him.(Things mentinoned: Grisha, Grisha Fabrikator, Wylan Van Eck)

patterns: Where does the bastard of the barrel come from?
responses: The barrel is Ketterdamns place full of dark alleyways. Housed in the barrel you can find people like the Kaz Brekker, or Pekka Rollins. There are also quite a few place to entertain your self for a night. The barrel houses some of the darkest, creepiest, and most powerful creatures in the world.(Things mentioned: Kaz Brekker, Pekka Rollins, Ketterdamn.)

Nina Zenik was a Grisha heartrender for the Second Army from Ravaka before she was captured by Matthias. Once her and Matthias made it to Ketterdamn she sent Matthias to hellgate fro being a slaver so that the other grisha in Ketterdamn wouldn't kill him. After sending Matthias to hellgate she joined the Dregs, or Kaz's crew. (Things mentioned: Kaz Brekker, Matthias Hevlar, Grisha, Grisha Heartrender)

patterns: Where do the character start off?
What city is the barrel in?
responses: Ketterdamn is the worlds trade center. Here the main language spoken is Kerch or language of Trade. In Kerch the highest ranking member of society are the merchant counsel. On the Merchant Counsel is Jan Van Eck, Wlyan Van Ecks father, and one of the main antagonists of the first book.(Things mentioned: Jan Van Eck, Wylan Van Eck)

Pekka Rollins is what you might call the big baddie. He is behind many things that cause the crew issues, and is the reason that Kaz's brother Jordie dies.(Things mentioned: Kaz Brekker, Jordie Brekker)
Ask me about the characters, the plot, the conflict or the setting to get started!

patterns: Where does the story take place?
What is the setting of the book?
What is the main setting of Six of Crows?
responses: Six of Crows has two main settings: Ketterdamn and Fjerda.(Things mentioned: Ketterdamn, Fjerda)

Fjerda is the home of the Ice Court. This is the place that is thought impenatrable that the crew is tasked with breaking into. Fjerda is also home of Matthias and the Drüskelle.(Things mentioned: Ice Court, Fjerda, Matthias, Drüskelle)
The Drüskelle are Fjerdian men whose job is to hunt down and kill Grisha. This is also how Matthias met Nina. (Things mentioned: Fjerda, Grisha, Matthias Hevlar, Nina Zenik)

patterns: What is the main issue of the story?
responses: The main conflict of the story is a daring heist. Our protagonists are tasked to break into the Ice Court, one of the most secure places on the planet, and steal the scientest who created juda parem, the grisha enchancing drug. If they can pull off the job they are promised 30 million kruge by Jan Van Eck. (Things mentioned: Ice Court, Juda Parem, Kruge, Jan Van Eck)
The main currency of Ketterdamn is kruge. It is about 10 USD.

patterns: Who is in the Second Army?
responses: Grisha are manipulators of the small science. They can be Corparalki, Materialki, or Etherealki. Corparalki are the order of the living and the dead. Materialki are the order of the fabrikators.
